general-title.name: General Settings
general-title.description: These settings dictate the <cy>basic functionality</c> of Playtime Tracker, you will probably find most useful settings here!

remove-pauses.name: Remove pauses from Playtime
remove-pauses.description: <cg>If enabled</c>, removes the time you spend in the pause menu from your playtime. <cy>This also removes the time you spend at the 'Level Complete' screen<c/>

stop-completion.name: Stop tracking after completion
stop-completion.description: <cg>When enabled</c>, the mod will stop tracking your playtime on every level where you have <cy>100% in normal mode</c>. <cr>ON EDITOR LEVELS</c>: Make sure you reset your best if you complete it while building to track your playtime when you verify your level.

short-text.name: Use short playtime text
short-text.description: <cg>If enabled</c>, uses a short version of the playtime, e.g. <cj>Xd Xh Xm Xs.</c> <cg>When disabled</c>, writes out the formats, e.g. <cj>X Days, X Hours, X Minutes, X Seconds.</c>

highest-convert.name: Convert playtime up to
highest-convert.description: Whenever you check your playtime, the mod will convert it <cy>up to the selected unit</c>, e.g. if you select "Hours", you will see your playtime converted to <cj>hours, minutes and seconds</c> whereas if you select "Days", you get your playtime converted to <cj>days, hours, minutes and seconds.</c>

infoLayer-position.name: Menu button position
infoLayer-position.description: Decide if the button on the level info page should appear above the favorites or on the left side of the screen. <cr>CHOOSING BOTTOM CAN LEAD TO VISUAL ISSUES (OVERLAPPING BUTTONS)!</c>

disable-deletion-popup.name: Disable info popup on deletion
disable-deletion-popup.description: Disables the popup that shows up after deleting sessions.

time-title.name: Time format settings
time-title.description: These settings relate to the way Playtime Tracker <cy>displays at what time your sessions happened</c> (in the popup on the level select screens)!

use-custom-time-format.name: Use custom time format
use-custom-time-format.description: Enables the option to enter your own custom time foramt

custom-time-format.name: Custom time format
custom-time-format.description: Enter your Custom time format! Reference to posible keys to use are in the following link <cj>(example: %d.%m.%Y %T for EU format)</c> https://cppreference.com/w/cpp/chrono/c/strftime.html

issues.info: Please report any bugs/crashes etc. on the repository or discord with an issue/forum post! Additionally, you can send me a dm on discord: @nanewtech
